feed.title: Zhao Xintong
feed.subtitle: What a privilege to meet you (*^0^*)

entry.title: Zhao Xintong
entry.content:
A student majoring in Business Administration at Macau University of Science and Technology

ABOUT ME 😊
"Occasionally depressed, occasionally publicity, always bright."
🧚‍♀️🪄 🐏
Hi, everyone! I am a Scorpio INFJ college student~

  • Come from Fujian but love Sichuan food
  • Of course, I love Fujian food best! Fuzhou's traditional snacks are the first in my heart
  • Trust in traditional Chinese medicine 🌿
  • Love to watch mystery movies and TV series 🔍
  • Like citywalk with friends on clear day 👣
  • Like to lie quietly in bed when it rains 🌧
  • Have a love affair ❤

Honor:
2018-2019 school year, awarded Outstanding Youth League member
2020-2021 school year, awarded the Outstanding Student Leader of Fuzhou
2020-2021 school year, awarded the School Merit Student

entry.title: Personal Work
entry.content:
✍🏻
In the one and a half year study life at the MUST, I also tried to do a lot of things that I had not been exposed to before. For example, I wrote a written review paper, started a company with my team members using the management theories I learned, analyzed social cases with my legal knowledge, introduced products with my marketing knowledge, participated in the HK Accountant Competition, and gave speeches in public and so on. All these have exercised my ability in all aspects and made me improve. 😉

entry.title: Beautiful life
entry.content:
Fragments of daily life
🎠🎡🎨🧸🍩🍀📸
While studying hard，I am also living well.
I like nature, I like movies，I like food，I like new things and I am curious about everything around me.
